Literature.Title: A short D-enantiomeric antimicrobial peptide with potent immunomodulatory and antibiofilm activity against multidrug-resistant Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Acinetobacter baumannii.
Literature.Author: Mohamed MF, Brezden A, Mohammad H, Chmielewski J, Seleem MN

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Murine macrophage cells J774A.1:EC50=128 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:EC50=64 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=256 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9721(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC BAA-1744(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 35032(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 25619(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 10145(MIC=8µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-1605(MIC=4µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=2µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-747(MIC=4µM),Acinetobacter baumannii NR-9667(MIC=4µM),Acinetobacter baumannii NR-13375(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 1109(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 1125(MIC=32µM)
